title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament The Lords and Commons taking into consideration the miserable distractions and calamities with which this whole kingdome and nation is now infested, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for John Wright, in the Old baily,
notes: Title from caption and first lines of text.

Dated and signed at end: Die Lun√¶, 10 Julii. 1643. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that this declaration shall be forthwith printed and published. J. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
A declaration of Parliament for postponement of the assizes.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
